entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:43 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
